00254   template<class T>
00255   bool parseEmfObject(const std::string& objectSerialized, T*& object_ptr, const std::string msgComp=std::string()) {
00256 
00257     object_ptr = NULL;
00258     try {
00259       //CREATE DATA MODEL
00260       T tmpObject;
00261       ecore::EPackage_ptr ecorePackage = tmpObject._eClass()->getEPackage();
00262       ecorecpp::MetaModelRepository::_instance()->load(ecorePackage);
00263 
00264       //Parse the model
00265       ecorecpp::parser::parser parser;
00266       object_ptr = parser.load_str(objectSerialized)->as< T >();
00267     }
00268     catch (std::exception& e) {
00269       return false;
00270     }
00271     return true;
00272   }
